mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment(commentId, feedId, curatorId, opinion) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{feedId}, #{curatorId}, #{opinion});
mapper.select: SELECT feed.feedId, comment.commentId, curator.name, profile.title, comment.opinion FROM Feed LEFT JOIN curator ON feed.curatorId = curator.id LEFT JOIN profile ON feed.curatorId = profile.curatorId LEFT JOIN comment ON feed.curatorId = comment.curatorId WHERE feed.feedId = #{feedId};
